snippet.title: Live: Matildas eye revenge and silverware v Brazil
snippet.content:
THE Matildas take on Brazil in the Tournament of Nations decider at the Carson's StubHub Center in Los Angeles from 9:10am AEST on Fox Sports 505. Almost exactly 12 months to the date of their devastating penalty shootout loss to Brazil in the Rio Olympics quarter-finals, Australia has a chance to avenge that result to win major silverware for the first time since 2010. A win or draw against Brazil will ensure Australia, who will wear black armbands in respect to legendary football broadcaster Les Murray AM, eclipses USA, Japan and Brazil to win the trophy. Watch the game on Fox Sports 505 HD, live stream the match, or follow the action in our live blog below!
Football: Sam Kerr has fired the Matildas to a second consecutive win at the Tournament of Nations, scoring a hat-trick in the first half of Australia's 4-2 defeat of Japan.
Kerr fires Matildas to win PREVIEW: Follow the game in our live blog below!
Football: The Australian womens football team are one win away from becoming Champions at the Tournament of Nations.
